import React from 'react' import { func } from 'prop-types' import { STATUS, PRIORITY } from '../../utils/constants' import { createDropDown } from '../../utils/utils' const namespace = 'filters' const Filters = ({ setPriorityFilter, setStatusFilter }) => { return (
